message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $100? It's a fair price considering the value this product offers.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm really interested in the product, but I still have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we split the difference and settle at $92.50? That's a very competitive price for this product.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit higher than $92.50. How about we try $87.50? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
